lyrics:
17 contributorstendencies lyricsverse 1 johnny 3 tears

aint nobody bad boy well feed you to them fucking dogs
ill keep on playing saint you keep begging me to stop

now its time to meet your maker hear the tolling of the bell
fucking kill you again when i see you in hell
now its time to meet your maker hear the tolling of the bell
fucking kill you again when i see you in hell bitch

chorus danny
shut your eyes let darkness lead the fight say goodnight
the rest will watch their future die buried alive say goodnight
its time to let now the dead dead come alive
we wave the flag for the rest of our lives
so shut your eyes let darkness lead the fight
say goodnight say goodnight

verse 2 jdog

and an animal like me can use it all to my advantage
youre the first to hit the floor cause you know that we stay lit
were kicking in your door cause we aint nothing to fuck with
